back to 2.807 nautical

14 Apr 2006 My projection to run 25 laps (10km) yesterday, was a bit optimistic.
I only managed o do 13 (5.2km).

In my defense, my right leg hurt from the start, I had eaten alot, it was very stormy and I was getting a huge blister smack in the middle of my left foot.
But I think the biggest factor is that I was running alone. It made time pass a lot more slowly.

That sounds like a bunch of excuses to me :)
I should have tried harder.
